p: Six of the most commonly used essential oils in our geographic area were tested for their antibacterial properties. Frankincense (resin from Boswellia sacra), myrtle ( Myrtus communis), thyme ( Thymus vulgaris), lemon ( Citrus limon), oregano ( Origanum vulgare) and lavender ( Lavandula angustifolia) essential oils were acquired from specialty retailer shops. We followed to get good quality, natural oils, with no added synthetic compounds.
